title: Food Pyramid Scheme: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
itunes:title: Food Pyramid Scheme: Motherf*ckin Mini Episode
description:
Langston and David answer a listener's email about how the food pyramid was racist and how it intentionally overlooked and missed America’s minorities. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
